exam.question: Not only the professionals but also the amateurs will________ from the new training facilities.

answer.explain: benefit from：  从…中受益。 句意：  无论是职业运动员还是业余运动员， 都会从这些新的训练设施中获益。 derive from：  起源； acquire：  获得， 学到； reward：  酬劳， 奖赏； acquire和reward都是及物动词， 不符合题意。

sentences.sContent: They are working together to benefit the whole community.
sentences.sCn: 他们在为整个社区的利益共同努力。

sentences.sContent: ...This behavior may have evolved as dogs gradually learned they could benefit from avoiding conflicts with humans...
...The puzzle was what benefit would be gained from it when performance might be affected the following day...
...and benefit from the spiritual enrichment that the reflection on the great ideas of mankind over time provides...
...Seniors at nursing homes could benefit from the weak job market...
...a person who gets great benefit from a public good should pay more for it than a person who gets little benefit...
...Citizens with much to protect get greater benefit from police than those with less to protect...
...economists say it is unclear whether older workers like him benefit much from more education...
...Some businesses will benefit but the vast bulk of the savings will be captured by workers...
...academic and economic benefit international students bring--is being put at risk...
...When we enjoy the benefit that the net brings us...
...so that these resources can benefit a greater percentage of the population...

...A recent study suggests that doctors start to make more objective decisions about who will truly benefit from screening- especially considering the explosion of the elderly that will soon swell our population...
...creating opportunities in organizations and communities that benefit everyone...
...feeding efforts are most satisfying to people and are of greatest benefit to birds...
...will bring us an ever-lasting benefit to both our campus and our society...
...Studies show merit aid also tends to benefit disproportionately students who could afford to enroll without it...
